<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157498</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157498</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">MUSIC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">MUSIK</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">MUSIQUE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">MÚSICA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">MUSICA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ΜΟΥΣΙΚΗ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">MÚSICA</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">the pupils have to create an ID card for 6 different famous singers. They have to get the information from the Internet and download pictures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">singers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Pupillen müssen eine Identifikation Karte 
für 6 unterschiedliche berühmte Sänger herstellen. Sie 
müssen die Informationen vom Internet erhalten und Abbildungen 
downloaden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les pupilles doivent créer une carte 
d'identification pour 6 chanteurs célèbres différents. Elles 
doivent obtenir l'information de l'Internet et télécharger des 
images.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as pupilas têm que criar um cartão do ID para 6
singers famosos diferentes. Têm que começar a informação do 
Internet e download retratos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le pupille devono creare una scheda di 
identificazione per 6 cantanti famosi differenti. Devono 
ottenere le informazioni dal Internet e trasferire le immagini dal 
sistema centrale verso i satelliti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι μαθητές πρέπει να δημιουργήσουν μια κάρτα 
ταυτότητας για 6 διαφορετικούς διάσημους τραγουδιστές. 
Πρέπει να πάρουν τις πληροφορίες από το Διαδίκτυο και να 
μεταφορτώσουν τις εικόνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las pupilas tienen que crear una tarjeta de la 
identificación para 6 diversos cantantes famosos. Tienen que 
conseguir la información del Internet y descargar cuadros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sänger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chanteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inglês de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">efl inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">singers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inglese imparante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">efl inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cantanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκμάθηση των αγγλικών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
